thread.section_title: DriveAway Holidays Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveAway Holidays Australia | driveaway.com.au
thread.title: Michael and Anna
thread.title_full: DriveAway Holidays Australia reviewed by Michael and Anna

author: Michael and Anna
title: Michael and Anna
text:
WE have booked a car both in the US and Switzerland with DriveAway online booking services. When we had a query about our Swiss online booking we were able to phone the Australian 1300 service and our questions were answered with courtesy and excellent customer service. The website is easy to use and gives all details of what is covered and what is not covered.
Anna and Michael.
